description.narrative: Insatsen bidrar till ungdomars ökade kunskap om sexuella och reproduktiva rättigheter samt lokala och regionala myndigheters ansvarstagande. Hittils har kommunerna ökat sin budget för frågorna, bjudit in deltagande av ungdomar i kommunförvaltningens plsnering, samt samordnat tillsammans med organisationer från civila samhället, program och aktiviteter som bidragit till att dess resultat nåtts i enlighet med planering.

The UNFPA project aims to support sexual and reproductive rights of young people in Bolivia. It provides advocacy for an improved legal framework,, strengthening the state's responsibility at the regional and municipal levels, and increases awareness among young people about their rights.

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: General question: Results related to the intended outcome 2015Question: Summarise results related to the intended outcome (this information will be sent to Open Aid)Answer: The results are according to plans. A final review has been done which has evaluated also indicators on effects and actual changes in the situation of violence and SRHR. Now we can see that the commitment to strengthen services and the network for the prevention of violence is high among the participating municipalities and that they have been able to recieve more cases. They are together with a large number of organizaitons, carrying out activities in different foras in their geographical areas. On the other hand, whether the violence has decreased is so far not possible to evaluate. However the results of the evaluation indicates that the intervention provides good incentives to prevent violence in local levels. The awareness of SRHR and how to prevent sexual violence has increased, and the discrimination against HBTI population has decreased.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
